name: IllustratorSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when saving a document as an Illustrator file.

property.name: compatibility
property.shortdesc: What Illustrator file format version to create.

property.name: fontSubsetThreshold
property.shortdesc: Include a subset of fonts when less than this percentage of characters are used (version 9 or later)

property.name: embedICCProfile
property.shortdesc: Embed the document's ICC profile in the saved file (version 9 or later)

property.name: embedLinkedFiles
property.shortdesc: Are linked image files to be included in the saved document (versions 7 or later)

property.name: flattenOutput
property.shortdesc: How should transparency be flattened for older file format versions (pre-version 9)

property.name: pdfCompatible
property.shortdesc: Save as a PDF compatible file (version 10 or later)

property.name: compressed
property.shortdesc: Should the saved file be compressed (version 10 or later)

property.name: saveMultipleArtboards
property.shortdesc: All the artboards or range of the artboards will be saved.

property.name: artboardRange
property.shortdesc: If SaveMultipleArtboards is true ,this will be considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.
